formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Path to wsadmin. If the location of wsadmin is in the PATH environment variable, then just the script name can be specified omitting its full path. E.g. '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'.

formElement.label: Connection Type:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of connection to use to connect to the application server that you want to administer. The valid choices are SOAP, RMI, and NONE. Default is SOAP.

formElement.label: Cell name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the cell in which to create a new cluster.

formElement.label: Cluster Members:
formElement.documentation: List of member app servers along with node names.For eg. if server1 and server2 on Node01 and Node02 resp. have to be members give input as Node01=server1,Node02=server2

formElement.label: Deploy Application on new cluster?:
formElement.documentation: Select the checkbox if you want to deploy an app on new cluster.

formElement.label: Commands:
formElement.documentation: Commands to be entered to wsadmin. Use one command per line.

formElement.label: Java Parameters:
formElement.documentation: Java options to be passed to wsadmin, separate them using semicolons (;).

formElement.label: Classpath:
formElement.documentation: Jars to be passed to the wsadmin classpath. It is a string containing paths (semicolon-separated) the required JARs to execute wsadmin in a particular job. i.e: 'c:/MyDir/Myjar.jar;d:/yourdir/yourdir.jar' or '/MyDir/Myjar.jar;/yourdir/yourdir.jar'

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the web application to be deploy. i.e: 'webapp'.

formElement.label: Application Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the application to deploy. i.e: '/path/to/webapp.war' or 'c:/mydir/webapp.war'.

formElement.label: Context root:
formElement.documentation: Context root for webmodules. If left empty, any web contexts defined in the deployment descriptors will get picked up.

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for wsadmin.
